statements: UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = '{0.5, 0.3, 0.7}', bias_vector = '{0.2, 0.4}' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET bias_vector = '{0.1, -0.2}', weight_matrix = '{0.6, 0.2, 0.4}' WHERE layer_name = 'output_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = '{0.1, 0.2, 0.3}', bias_vector = '{0.4, 0.5}' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer'
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET bias_vector = '{0.6, 0.7}', weight_matrix = '{0.2, 0.3, 0.4}' WHERE layer_name = 'output_layer'
UPDATE neural_network_layers SET layer_name='HiddenLayer' WHERE layer_id=1;
UPDATE network_training_data SET input_data={'data':[1,2,3]} WHERE data_id=1;
UPDATE neural_network_layers SET weights = '{1, 2, 3, 4, 5}' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE network_training_data SET input_data = '{0.2, 0.4, 0.6}', output_data = '{0.1, 0.2}' WHERE data_id = 3;
UPDATE neural_network_layers SET weights = 'new_weights' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE fine_tuning_logs SET accuracy = 0.95, loss = 0.1 WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE neural_network_layers SET weights = ?, biases = ? WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE training_data SET input_data = ?, output_data = ? WHERE training_id = 3;
UPDATE layer_weights SET weights = 'new_weights' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE neuron_activations SET activation_value = 0.75 WHERE activation_id = 3;
UPDATE layer_weights SET weights = :new_weights WHERE layer_id = :layer_id
UPDATE fine_tuning_settings SET regularization_factor = :new_reg_factor, learning_rate = :new_learning_rate WHERE setting_id = :setting_id
UPDATE layer_weights SET weight_data = E'\x1234' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE model_metrics SET accuracy = 0.85 WHERE metric_id = 2;
UPDATE layer_weights SET weight_data = 'new data' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE model_metrics SET accuracy = 0.75, loss = 0.2 WHERE metric_id = 1;
